committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should issue a proclamation designating the week beginning on November 16, 1980, as "National Family Week".

summary.text: Urges the President to designate the week beginning November 16, 1980, as "National Family Week."

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should issue a proclamation designating the week beginning on November 16, 1980, as "National Family Week".
